entry.source: {F871,1}Indeed, there was a time when you and{F801}I might have talked through our{F801}differences...{F801}{F802}But that door is closed now. You must{F801}walk the path you have committed to.{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}Indeed, there was a time when you and{F801}I might have talked through our{F801}differences...{F801}{F802}But that door is closed now. You must{F801}walk the path you have committed to.{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}...I cannot do that. I cannot allow{F801}your desires to reach fruition.{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}...I cannot do that. I cannot allow{F801}your desires to reach fruition.{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}It wasn't so long ago that we used to{F801}speak casually whenever we liked...{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}It wasn't so long ago that we used to{F801}speak casually whenever we liked...{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}Ah...! This is wonderful...!{F801}{F802}For us to resume our close relationship{F801}wherein we can while away the hours{F801}with idle conversation...!{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}Ah...! This is wonderful...!{F801}{F802}For us to resume our close relationship{F801}wherein we can while away the hours{F801}with idle conversation...!{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}...Might we speak for a while longer?{F801}When I think that this could be the last{F801}chat we have, I...{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}...Might we speak for a while longer?{F801}When I think that this could be the last{F801}chat we have, I...{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}Mercy, you ask? 'Tis a fine request{F801}after all this time...{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}Mercy, you ask? 'Tis a fine request{F801}after all this time...{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}I understand. For the sake of the{F801}friendship we once shared...{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}I understand. For the sake of the{F801}friendship we once shared...{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}Please... Don't wake me... Let me{F801}sleep... even if only for now...{F801}{F802}If you want mercy, I shall grant it...{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}Please... Don't wake me... Let me{F801}sleep... even if only for now...{F801}{F802}If you want mercy, I shall grant it...{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}...'Tis very strange, but I felt{F801}a compulsion to show you kindness{F801}once more.{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}...'Tis very strange, but I felt{F801}a compulsion to show you kindness{F801}once more.{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}Have you taken leave of your senses...?{F801}To appeal to me, of all people, for a{F801}donation is simply...{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}Have you taken leave of your senses...?{F801}To appeal to me, of all people, for a{F801}donation is simply...{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}'Tis a grave crime to disgrace a solemn{F801}bout between Samurai.{F801}{F802}Your sentence shall be carried out at{F801}the tip of my blade.{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}'Tis a grave crime to disgrace a solemn{F801}bout between Samurai.{F801}{F802}Your sentence shall be carried out at{F801}the tip of my blade.{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}Why are you befouling a bout between{F801}Samurai so...!?{F801}{F802}I'll give you all the money you want...{F801}Only please, stop this madness!{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}Why are you befouling a bout between{F801}Samurai so...!?{F801}{F802}I'll give you all the money you want...{F801}Only please, stop this madness!{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}Have you taken leave of your senses...?{F801}To appeal to me, of all people, for a{F801}donation is simply...{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}Have you taken leave of your senses...?{F801}To appeal to me, of all people, for a{F801}donation is simply...{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}You wish to barter for items? 'Tis a{F801}cunning ploy you've devised.{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}You wish to barter for items? 'Tis a{F801}cunning ploy you've devised.{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}I shall give you this... as a final{F801}tribute to an old friend.{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}I shall give you this... as a final{F801}tribute to an old friend.{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}Negotiations? Don't be absurd. I have{F801}nothing to withhold from you any longer.{F801}{F802}Here... I give you this, with my{F801}compliments. Take it.{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}Negotiations? Don't be absurd. I have{F801}nothing to withhold from you any longer.{F801}{F802}Here... I give you this, with my{F801}compliments. Take it.{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}This is a final tribute, after all...{F801}Perhaps you should have this as well.{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}This is a final tribute, after all...{F801}Perhaps you should have this as well.{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}...I'd prefer to keep this brief.{F801}Let us come to the point.{F801}{F802}{F804,1}{F878,1} Macca.{F804,0}{F801}Well? Is this acceptable?{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}...I'd prefer to keep this brief.{F801}Let us come to the point.{F801}{F802}{F804,1}{F878,1} Macca.{F804,0}{F801}Well? Is this acceptable?{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}You must give me {F804,1}a lot{F804,0} of your {F804,1}stamina.{F804,0}{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}You must give me {F804,1}a lot{F804,0} of your {F804,1}stamina.{F804,0}{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}You must give me {F804,1}a great deal indeed{F804,0}{F801}of your {F804,1}stamina.{F804,0}{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}You must give me {F804,1}a great deal indeed{F804,0}{F801}of your {F804,1}stamina.{F804,0}{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}You must give me {F804,1}a lot{F804,0} of your {F804,1}spirit.{F804,0}{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}You must give me {F804,1}a lot{F804,0} of your {F804,1}spirit.{F804,0}{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}You must give me {F804,1}a great deal indeed{F804,0}{F801}of your {F804,1}spirit.{F804,0}{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}You must give me {F804,1}a great deal indeed{F804,0}{F801}of your {F804,1}spirit.{F804,0}{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}Your demon ally... You must sacrifice{F801}the {F804,1}life of {F873,2}.{F804,0}{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}Your demon ally... You must sacrifice{F801}the {F804,1}life of {F873,2}.{F804,0}{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}...I've received a nice memento.{F801}This... shall be enough...{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}...I've received a nice memento.{F801}This... shall be enough...{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}'Tis beyond the pale to hold back in{F801}a solemn bout.{F801}{F802}I trust you are prepared for the{F801}consequences...!{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}'Tis beyond the pale to hold back in{F801}a solemn bout.{F801}{F802}I trust you are prepared for the{F801}consequences...!{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}'Tis beyond the pale to cheat in a{F801}solemn bout.{F801}{F802}I trust you are prepared for the{F801}consequences...!{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}'Tis beyond the pale to cheat in a{F801}solemn bout.{F801}{F802}I trust you are prepared for the{F801}consequences...!{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}Life Stones are a necessary starting{F801}point for any negotiation, I'm afraid.{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}Life Stones are a necessary starting{F801}point for any negotiation, I'm afraid.{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}...Forgive me. It has indeed gone on{F801}too long. 'Tis more than enough for{F801}my purposes.{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}...Forgive me. It has indeed gone on{F801}too long. 'Tis more than enough for{F801}my purposes.{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}Your impatience is beyond the pale in{F801}this solemn bout.{F801}{F802}I trust you are prepared for the{F801}consequences...!{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}Your impatience is beyond the pale in{F801}this solemn bout.{F801}{F802}I trust you are prepared for the{F801}consequences...!{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}To be so consistent in your refusal...{F801}I admit, I am impressed.{F801}{F802}If only I shared such a spirit...{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}To be so consistent in your refusal...{F801}I admit, I am impressed.{F801}{F802}If only I shared such a spirit...{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}You have been as pliant as a reed.{F801}Have you no will of your own?{F801}{F802}You are a disappointment as a Samurai...{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}You have been as pliant as a reed.{F801}Have you no will of your own?{F801}{F802}You are a disappointment as a Samurai...{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}You truly have nothing... Does this mean{F801}that you have fought all this time in{F801}such poverty?{F801}{F802}You were... a remarkable person after{F801}all, I see.{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}You truly have nothing... Does this mean{F801}that you have fought all this time in{F801}such poverty?{F801}{F802}You were... a remarkable person after{F801}all, I see.{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}Do not harp on the same point so many{F801}times... it only prolongs our bout.{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}Do not harp on the same point so many{F801}times... it only prolongs our bout.{F801}{F802}
